'''SpongeBob SquarePants Add-On''' is an official add-on made based off of the [[SpongeBob SquarePants]] ''Nickelodeon'' animated series.

=== NPC ===
* [[File:Barnacle Boy skin render.png|40px]] Barnacle Boy
* [[File:Bubble Bass render.png|40px]] Bubble Bass
* [[File:Garry.png|40px]] Gary
** Spawned in SpongeBob’s quest
* [[file:Grandma Squarepants.png|40px]] Grandma SquarePants
* [[file:Harold.png|40px]] Harold SquarePants
* [[File:Margaret.png|40px]] Margaret SquarePants
*[[File:Karen skin render.png|40px]] Karen
* [[File:Mermaid Man skin render.png|40px]] Mermaid Man
* [[File:Mrs Puff skin render.png|40px]] Mrs. Puff
* [[File:Mr Krabs skin render.png|40px]] Mr.Krabs
** When spawning, he will offer a quest to get a [[Furnace]] and [[Coal]] while the goal of this is to reach 12 customers, after which Mr Krabs will give the player a blueprint of the Krusty Krab, Also, there is bubbles spawning with Frozen Krabby Patties inside the bubble
* [[file:Patrick Star skin render.png|40px]] Patrick 
** When spawning, he will offer a quest in which the player will have to collect 12 jellyfish, after which Patrick will give the player a blueprint of his house
* [[File:Pearl Krabs skin render.png|40px]] Pearl Krabs
* [[File:Plankton.png|20px]] Plankton
* [[file:Sandy Cheeks.png|60px]] Sandy
** She will offer a quest to find Sandy's Key in scallops when she spawns. After completing this quest she gives the player Sandy's House blueprint.
* [[File:SpongeBob SquarePants render.png|40px]] SpongeBob 
** First character to spawn into the world
** He will offer a quest to rescue Garry, and after completing the quest he will give the player a blueprint of a house
** When the player builds SpongeBob's house, SpongeBob can adventure with player and heal him with krabby patties
* [[file:Squidward Tentacles skin render.png|40px]] Squidward

=== Mobs ===
==== Passive ====
* [[File:Bubble Buddy.png|40px]] Bubble Buddy
* [[file:Jellyfish.png|40px]] Jellyfish
* [[file:Seahorse yellow.png|40px]] Seahorse
**Can be ridden 
*Has green, blue, orange, purple, red, and yellow variants
* [[File:Friendly Doodle Minion.png|40px]] Friendly Doodle Minion
** Three friendly doodle minions are created when a magical pencil is used

==== Neutral ====
* [[File:Scallop.png|40px]] Scallop
** Spawns in Sandy's quest to find Sandy's Key in scallops

==== Hostile ====
* [[File:Angry Wolf SPSPAO.png|40px]] Angry Wolf
** Spawns in SpongeBob's quest to rescue Garry
* [[File:Doodlebob Minion.png|40px]] DoodleBob Minion
** Spawned by DoodleBob with a pencil
* [[File:Angry Jellyfish.png|40px]] Angry Jellyfish
** Jellyfish transform into Angry Jellyfish when player hits Jellyfish or spawned by King Jellyfish

==== Bosses ====
* [[File:Mecha Karen.png|40px]] Mecha Karen
** Boss mob
** Attacks with a chum blaster and by waving its hands around itself
** Drops treasure chest which drops Cassette Plankton or Chum Blaster 
* [[file:King Jellyfish.png|40px]] King Jellyfish 
** Boss mob
** Spawns multiple angry jellyfish
** Attacks by rising up and sharply falling down, creating a shock wave around itself
** Drops treasure chest which contains a Jellyfish Glider or King Jellyfish Crown
* [[File:DoodleBob.png|40px]] DoodleBob 
** Boss mob
** Spawns doodle minions
** Stunned when hit with a regular sword, during the stun phase a magic pencil appear which can be used to deal damage to Doodlebob
*[[File:The Flying Dutchman.png|40px]] The Flying Dutchman
** Boss mob
** Attacks with cannonballs
** Can fly
** Replaces the [[Ender Dragon]]
